title: Do I still need to be a team player if my ADC is ultra drunk?
body:
i know it is norms, but cmon, don't pick ADC if you know you're not gonna be able to even CS ;( 

well at least the /ff20 was quick... the SOB tried to hit no, but my team had mercy on my soul.

well, at least now I know there are worse people I could be in lane with.
